mapper.select: select awardnum , awardday , awardprice , cname, cdname, actname, panmaeja , deliverstatus, cnum, cdnum, actnum, actdnum , actimage from ( select rownum AS RNO, awardnum , to_char(awardday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS awardday , awardprice , cname, cdname, actname, panmaeja , deliverstatus, cnum, cdnum, actnum, actdnum , actimage from (select cnum, cname, cdnum, cdname , actnum, actname, actimage , actdnum, fk_usernum, actd_price, actd_qty, actd_status, actd_content, actd_lowertenderprice , to_char(actd_startday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS actd_startday , to_char(actd_endday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS actd_endday , E.fk_userid AS panmaeja from tbl_category A join tbl_category_detail B on A.cnum = B.fk_cnum join tbl_auction C on B.cdnum = C.fk_cdnum join tbl_auction_detail D on C.actnum = D.fk_actnum join tbl_member_detail E on D.fk_usernum = E.usernum )V right join tbl_award F on V.actdnum = F.fk_actdnum join tbl_deliver G on F.awardnum = G.fk_awardnum where F.fk_usernum = #{usernum} and V.actd_status = 0 order by awardnum desc )T where T.RNO >= #{startRno} and T.RNO <= #{endRno}

select cnum, cname , cdnum, cdname , actnum, actname, actimage , actdnum, fk_usernum, actd_price, actd_qty, actd_status, actd_content, actd_lowertenderprice , to_char(actd_startday, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS actd_startday, startprice , to_char(actd_endday, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS actd_endday , E.fk_userid AS panmaeja from tbl_category A join tbl_category_detail B on A.cnum = B.fk_cnum join tbl_auction C on B.cdnum = C.fk_cdnum join tbl_auction_detail D on C.actnum = D.fk_actnum join tbl_member_detail E on D.fk_usernum = E.usernum where D.actdnum = #{actdnum}
select cnum, cname, cdnum, fk_cnum, cdname from tbl_category A join tbl_category_detail B on A.cnum = B.fk_cnum where B.cdnum = (select fk_cdnum from tbl_auction where actnum = #{actnum})
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_joinaclist(joinactnum, fk_actnum, fk_usernum, tenderday, tenderprice) values(seq_joinaclist.nextval, #{actnum}, #{usernum}, default, #{tenderprice})
mapper.select: select max(tenderprice) AS tenderprice from tbl_joinaclist where fk_actnum = to_number(#{actnum})
select count(*) from tbl_joinaclist where fk_actnum = to_number(#{actnum})
select joinactnum, fk_actnum, fk_usernum, tenderday, tenderprice from tbl_joinaclist where fk_actnum = to_number(#{actnum}) and tenderprice = to_number(#{nowprice})
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_award(AWARDNUM, FK_USERNUM, FK_ACTDNUM, AWARDDAY, AWARDPRICE) values(seq_award.nextval, #{fk_usernum}, #{actdnum}, sysdate, #{nowprice})
mapper.update: update tbl_auction_detail set actd_status = 0 where fk_actnum = #{actnum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_deliver(deliverno, fk_usernum, fk_awardnum, deliverstatus, invoiceno, deliverlocation) values(seq_deliver.nextval, #{fk_usernum}, #{AWARDNUM}, default, 's' || to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || '-' || seq_deliver.nextval, #{ADDR})
mapper.select: select awardnum, addr1 || ' ' || addr2 AS addr from tbl_award A join tbl_member_detail B on A.fk_usernum = B.usernum where A.fk_usernum = #{fk_usernum} and A.fk_actdnum = #{actdnum}
